text: KSPL-LP (98.1 FM) is a low-power radio station broadcasting a religious format. Licensed to John Day, Oregon, United States, the station is currently owned by Valley View Broadcasting, Inc. ==References== ==External links== * SPL-LP SPL-LP Category:Religious radio stations in the United States Category:John Day, Oregon Category:Three Angels Broadcasting Network radio stations SPL-LP
title: KSPL-LP
